thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core

Class Face4

  • java.lang.Object
    • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core.Face3
      • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core.Face4

  • public class Face4
extends Face3
    Face4 represent the rectangular sides (A, B, C, D) of the geometric object. 
     Vector3 normal = new Vector3( 0, 1, 0 ); 
 Color color = new Color( 0xffaa00 ); 
 Face4 face = new Face4( 0, 1, 2, 3, normal, color, 0 );
    Author:
    thothbot
